channel.title: Add colors for each filter in one graph
channel.description:
Hello , I want to apply colors to filters in a single graph, i.e. I want to have for each filter a single graph with different colors that correspond to the selected filter.
Is this possible in redash ?

item.title: Add colors for each filter in one graph
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Itâ€™s not clear what you mean. But the answer is probably not. Colours are global for each visualisation and cannot be affected by parameters.

Read full topic
item.source: Add colors for each filter in one graph
